# Introduction 

## Question 1
```{r}
courses <- vroom(here("courses.csv"),
                col_types = cols(
    nb_grades = col_integer())) |> 
  rename(nb_exams = nb_grades)
```



## Question 2 
```{r}
courses |>
  summarise("course name" = course, 
            "identifier" = course_id,
            "module" = module,
            "number of exams" = nb_exams) |>
  arrange(courses$course) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
